articles.title: Bristol Myers celebrates a big win with FDA approval of $13B cardio drug mavacamten - Endpoints News
articles.description: After getting hit with an FDA delay back in November, Bristol Myers Squibb is finally celebrating a win for mavacamten, the centerpiece of the company’s $13 billion MyoKardia buyout back in 2020. Regulators approved mavacamten on Thursday to treat symptomatic…
